newsitem.title: USA: Nobel Insurance Ltd Q1 net decreases.
newsitem.headline: Nobel Insurance Ltd Q1 net decreases.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)
NOTE: Revenues include net premiums earned of $8.6 million and $13.3 million for the first quarters of 1997 and 1998, respectively, a decrease of 35 percent in net premiums earned.
The consolidated combined ratio for the first quarter of 1997 was 86.5 percent compared to 103.4 percent for the first quarter of 1996.

Net income for the first quarter of 1997 included some non-recurring expenses associated with a reorganization in the Commercial Casualty Division and reduced premiums due to the increase in ceded reinsurance premiums and corresponding lower retention of risk. The company was not immediately available to discuss the non-recurring expenses.
